title: 'Dhurandhar' crosses Rs 500 crore in record time; eyes Rs 1,000 crore worldwide
description: Bollywood's 'Dhurandhar' continues its phenomenal box office journey, crossing Rs 500 crore net in its third week. Starring Ranveer Singh and Akshaye Khanna, the film is now the second-fastest to reach this milestone, surpassing 'Jawan'. With strong word-of-mouth and repeat viewership, its worldwide gross is nearing Rs 1,000 crore.

Passengers are advised to check flight status and rebook or seek refunds if affected.

This move aims to incentivize youth joining the armed forces by offering them a follow-up career in central paramilitary forces. Ex-Agniveers will also be exempted from physical tests.

With the Lakers short-handed due to multiple player absences, Doncic's role in organizing the offense and closing games becomes even more critical. title: Who is Nicole Osbourne? Inside Anthony Joshua’s split and co-parenting
description: Boxer Anthony Joshua's personal life draws attention. His son's mother, Nicole Osbourne, a dancer and yoga instructor, shares co-parenting duties. He remains dedicated to fatherhood amidst ongoing boxing discussions.

Dutta claimed an influential person disrupted crowd control plans, allowing unauthorized access. Messi reportedly received Rs 89 crore for the tour, with Rs 11 crore paid in tax. Investigations into security lapses and financial dealings are ongoing.

He also generates significant income from endorsements and property investments. Joshua is set to earn a guaranteed £70 million from his upcoming fight against Jake Paul, a professionally sanctioned eight-round heavyweight bout.

title: Maharashtra horror: Nurse gang-raped after knocking on wrong hotel room; 3 accused arrested
description: A 30-year-old nurse was allegedly gang-raped by three men in a hotel room in Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar after she mistakenly knocked on their door. The accused, including two recovery agents and an MBA student, were arrested and remanded in police custody. The victim had gone to meet a friend for financial assistance when the incident occurred.

title: Google founder’s prediction 25-yrs ago is now company’s reality: What he said about AI
description: A resurfaced 2000 video shows Google co-founder Larry Page accurately predicting the future of AI-driven search. He envisioned an "ultimate search engine" that would understand user intent and provide direct answers, a capability now realized by Gemini models. Page acknowledged the company was far from this goal then but was committed to incremental progress, leveraging vast data and computational resources.

title: Maple Leafs fans on edge as Auston Matthews trade talks heat up
description: Maple Leafs captain Auston Matthews is facing scrutiny as his scoring has slowed. This has sparked discussions about his future with the team. Toronto management must navigate this delicate situation. The coming months will be crucial for both Matthews and the Maple Leafs' legacy. The team aims for immediate success.

title: Zuckerberg's 'highest-paid' employee is reportedly unhappy with his Boss - What he said
description: Meta's $14.8 billion investment in Scale AI and the integration of its CEO, Alexandr Wang, into a new "superintelligence" lab are reportedly facing internal friction. Wang allegedly finds Mark Zuckerberg's micromanagement "suffocating," while some staff question Wang's experience. This shift also clashes with Meta's open-source AI philosophy, leading to executive departures.
